short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A more faster way to replace texts like you would via inspect element

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of having to manually using "inspect element" to replace/change websites texts, all it takes is 1 click of a button! Just simply copy and paste the text you wish to change into the top textbox, and input what you wish to change it to and that's it! Simply click on the "Replace" button and all the manual work will be done!
